name: Flower Garden: Harvest Forever!
description:
In the role of a flower garden owner, your task is harvest as much as possible. Let's move the flowers of the same color into 1 line to easily harvest them. You can only harvest flowers if the connection is 1 line of 4 or more flowers of the same color. The new flowers are always growing up. If you do not harvest fast enough, the flowers will be no land to grow, you will lose.

Now, let's harvest.


Flower Garden features:
● Link 4 or more of the same color flowers to harvest.
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● Auto save last game, easy to continue
● Flash Mode available, 4 seconds for 1 turn, faster and more faster.
